location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Henry Frederick Disbrowe, Assistant Resident in the Persian Gulf, in charge at Bushire to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, at Baghdad

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy of a communication sent to the Assistant Resident by the British Agent at Muscat (see ff 213-219) dated 9 October 1855. It states this is in order to inform him that Syed Saeed [Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd], the Imam of Muscat, is contemplating calling on the assistance of Busrah [Basra] for 'warlike purposes' in his dispute with the Persians over Bunder Abbas [Bandar-e ʻAbbās].
